definition: content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere

sentences.english: These photos capture some of the most tranquil and relaxing paradises on Earth.
sentences.chinese: 這些照片拍攝下了地球上一些最安謐最閒適的天堂。

sentences.english: At this moment, we should not panic, you have to have a tranquil quiet of mind.
sentences.chinese: 此時此刻，要處變不驚，就得有一份安謐寧靜的心態。

sentences.english: Days in the sea here, over there on the horizon what will be an interpretation of what peaceful.
sentences.chinese: 天在這邊海在那邊一個地平線上究竟會演繹什麼安謐。

sentences.english: The landscape is good, quiet, clean, and peaceful.
sentences.chinese: 風景上好，安謐，清新，又祥和。

sentences.english: I am the stars warmly greaming, Prada shoes women, over Darnassus softly dreaming.
sentences.chinese: 我是暖和閃耀的星，暉映達納蘇斯的安謐長逝。

sentences.english: I am the stars warmly gleaming , over Darnassus softly dreaming .
sentences.chinese: 我是暖和閃爍的星，照射達納蘇斯的安謐永夜。

sentences.english: It's another peaceful night, and again I think of my good friend far away.
sentences.chinese: 又是一個安謐的夜晚，我想起了遠方的好友。

sentences.english: If the time is prefer always accordingly peaceful and, the this present life doesn't garbage a degree as well.
sentences.chinese: 若是光陰一直如此安謐寧和，此生也不枉度。

definition: to drift/to wave/to float on the waves/to flutter in the wind
variant of 戰慄|战栗[zhan4 li4]
to miss/to yearn day and night
sky clears after rain/new hopes after a disastrous period (idiom)/every cloud has a silver lining (idiom)/see also 雨過天晴|雨过天晴[yu3 guo4 tian1 qing2]
to ride the dragon/to die (of emperors and kings)
(bird species of China) grey heron (Ardea cinerea)
